name: Randomize the white of Notes
description: Whether to also randomize the white part of note color

name: Fully randomize notes
description:
Whether the outline should be random too, or should try to be a darker shade of the main color
(WARNING MAY BE INNACURATE IF NOT RANDOMIZING FROM TABLE)

name: Fix Hold Notes
description: Whether to fully randomize each section of the hold notes or use parent note's color

name: Randomize from table
description: Whether to fully randomize the RGB values, or just pick from a pre-determined list (WILL BE OVERRIDDEN BY RANDOMIZE FROM NOTE TABLE)

name: Randomize from note table
description: Whether to randomize from a table based on what note is being affected

name: Refresh colors every 2 Beats
description: Whether to refresh every 2 Beats, WARNING: WILL CAUSE OCCASIONAL GLITCHES WITH HOLD NOTES, oh and also POTENTIAL LAG.

name: True Chaos Mode
description: Randomize EVERYTHING every 4 beats so it dont kill your game TOO hard.

name: Force random on all notes
description: If randomize textures enabled, also randomize the texture of every note regardless of type.
